level.heading: Reporting an unsafe or hazardous condition.
level.text: ยง28-304.6.3 Reporting an unsafe or hazardous condition. If an inspection reveals that any elevator or other conveying system is unsafe or hazardous to life and safety, the device is to be taken out of service immediately by the agency performing the inspection and the building owner notified immediately. The department shall be notified by telephone or fax within 24 hours.
